name: galladite
effect: Held: Allows Gallade to Mega Evolve into Mega Gallade.
short_effect: Held: Allows Gallade to Mega Evolve into Mega Gallade.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Gallade hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.
